content: Lene Nielsen - IT-University of Copenhagen Lene Nielsen Lene Nielsen PhD Associate Professor, Digitalization, Democracy, and GovernanceREFLACT https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1768-7147 Emailleneitudk 20022025 Research activity per year Personal profile CurriculumLene Nielsen is an Associate Professor at ITU, Section for Digitalization, Democracy and Governance, member of the Reflact research group Her research focuses mainly on personas, and includes democratic businesses and service systems Lene Nielsen was the first to write a PhD about personas. Her research topics include the many aspects of the development and use of personas, such as: Global personasPersonas based on quantitative dataPersona descriptions as communication to specific and different audiencesThe relationship between persona description and dataThe use of personas in agile developmentPersonas in service designPlanetary PersonasAI generated personas Lene Nielsen har published three books, 5 chapters on personas and more than 90 papers Lene Nielsen teaches Organizing and managing services Impact More than 25 research projects with industry.
